Adult.description: Little Blue Herons have a blue-gray belly, whereas Tricolored Herons have a white belly.

Nonbreeding adult dark morph.description: Reddish Egrets lack the Tricolored Heron's white belly. They also have an entirely rusty-colored neck, whereas Tricolored Herons have a blue-gray, white, and purplish neck.

Adult (Blue form).description: Great Blue Herons are much larger and paler overall than Tricolored Herons. They also tend to forage more slowly with their head down that do Tricolored Herons.
